message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is still a great deal, considering the value it can bring to your life. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. Can you consider this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10800. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the value it can bring to your life. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not willing to pay $10800. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're really close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal considering the value it can bring to your life. What do you think?
